metadata.Title: CVE-2011-4183 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability in open build service allows remote attackers to uploadarbitrary RPM files. Affected releases are SUSE open build service prior to2.1.16.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-4183` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

obs-api - 2.7.4-2
obs-productconverter - 2.7.4-2
obs-server - 2.7.4-2
obs-utils - 2.7.4-2
obs-worker - 2.7.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: open-build-service package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.4-2').
